verificacao: Documentos de saÌda n„o tributados (NF-e) n„o escriturados no LRS
consulta:
SELECT nfe.CHAVE as "Chave", emissao AS "Emiss„o", 
		CASE WHEN length(trim(cnpj_dest)) = 0 THEN '' ELSE CASE WHEN is_cpf(cnpj_dest) THEN REPLACE(to_char(cnpj_dest::bigint, '000:000:000-00'),':','.') ELSE REPLACE(to_char(cnpj_dest::bigint, '00:000:000/0000-00'),':','.') END END as "CNPJ/CPF Destinat·rio", 
		razao_social_dest AS "Raz„o Social Destinat·rio", uf_dest AS "UF Destinat·rio", 
		modelo as "Modelo", NUMERO as "N˙mero", serie as "SÈrie", Total_NFe as "Total NFe",
		natureza_operacao AS "Natureza OperaÁ„o", total_nfe as "Total",
		nfe_item.item AS "Item", nfe_item.desc_produto AS "DescriÁ„o Produto", nfe_item.cfop AS "CFOP",
		(nfe_item.valor_produto + nfe_item.valor_seguro + nfe_item.valor_frete + nfe_item.valor_outro - nfe_item.valor_desconto) AS "Valor OperaÁ„o"
FROM NFE 
	LEFT JOIN reg_c100 AS efd ON (NFE.CHAVE = EFD.CHV_NFE OR (efd.cod_mod = '55' AND efd.cod_sit != '05' AND nfe.numero = efd.num_doc::integer AND nfe.serie = efd.ser::integer))
	JOIN cadesp 
		JOIN cadesp_regime ON cadesp.ie = cadesp_regime.ie
	ON nfe.cnpj_emit = cadesp.cnpj
	JOIN nfe_item on nfe.chave = nfe_item.chave
WHERE nfe.CNPJ_EMIT = CNPJ_AUDITORIA()
AND nfe.emissao BETWEEN 
	greatest(cadesp_regime.inicio_regime, inicio_auditoria()) AND least(COALESCE(cadesp_regime.fim_regime, now()), fim_auditoria())
AND cadesp_regime.regime = 'RPA'
AND SITUACAO_DOCUMENTO = '0'
and tipo_doc_fiscal = 'SaÌda'
AND total_nfe > 0
AND ((nfe_item.icms_bc = 0 AND nfe_item.icmsst_bc = 0) OR (nfe_item.cfop IN (5605,5929))) 
AND efd.id IS NULL
ORDER BY emissao, nfe.CHAVE, nfe_item.item ASC
